Ability.Name: --InitializePvE--
Ability.Lua:
if PQR_RotationStarted == true then PQR_RotationStarted = false if PQR_LoadLua ~= nil then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_failroadPvEdata.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("Put PQR_failroadPvEdata.lua in the data folder.", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end end end
--Options-- useDR = true --use dragon roar automatically autoStance = true --auto force stances gagOrder = false --use heroic throw to interrupt autoBloodBath = true --automatic use bloodbath autoReck = false --automatic use Recklessness chargeInterrupt = true --Use charge to interrupt if not popping offensive cooldowns intPctDelay = 33 --Percentage of cast to let happen until interrupt.
--EndOptions--
------------ --Keybinds-- ------------ mockingBannerKey = IsLeftShiftKeyDown() heroicLeapKey = IsLeftControlKeyDown() demoBannerKey = IsLeftAltKeyDown() -- = IsRightShiftKeyDown() -- = IsRightControlKeyDown() pauseKey = IsRightAltKeyDown() -- = IsMouseButtonDown(3) shockWaveKey = IsMouseButtonDown(4) -- = IsMouseButtonDown(5) --------------- --EndKeybinds-- ---------------
--FixLag local ping = tonumber((select(3,GetNetStats()) + select(4,GetNetStats())) / 2000) + .025
if ping < .05 then ping = .05 elseif ping > .3 then ping = .3 end PQR_SpellAvailableTime = ping
if autoStance == true then --Arms if GetSpecialization() == 1 then if GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 1 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) end
if IsEquippedItemType("shields") == true then if UseEquipmentSet("2HSet") ~= nil then return true end end end
--Fury if GetSpecialization() == 2 and GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 1 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) end
--Prot if GetSpecialization() == 3 and GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 2 then CastShapeshiftForm(2) end
end
--PauseKey if pauseKey ~= nil then return true end

Ability.Name: --Interrupts--
Ability.Lua:
local castingTarget = nil
for i=1, #custTars do if ( select(9,UnitCastingInfo(custTars[i]))==false or select(8,UnitChannelInfo(custTars[i]))==false ) then castingTarget = custTars[i] end end
if castingTarget ~= nil then local cName, _, _, _, cStart,cEnd = UnitCastingInfo(castingTarget) local chName, _, _, _, chStart,chEnd = UnitChannelInfo(castingTarget) if chName ~= nil then cName = chName cStart = chStart cEnd = chEnd end local timeSinceStart = (GetTime() * 1000 - cStart) / 1000 local timeLeft = ((GetTime() * 1000 - cEnd) * -1) / 1000 local castTime = cEnd - cStart local currentPercent = timeSinceStart / castTime * 100000
--Pum-- if cdRemains(6552) == 0 and rangeCheck(6552,castingTarget) == true and ( PQR_IsOnInterruptList(cName) ~= nil or PQR_IsInterruptAll() ~= nil ) and currentPercent >= intPctDelay then _castSpell(6552,castingTarget) PQR_DelayRotation(.5) end --DS-- if (cdRemains(6552) > 0 or rangeCheck(6552,castingTarget) == nil) and cdRemains(102060) == 0 and CheckInteractDistance(castingTarget,3) ~= nil and UnitIsEnemy("player",castingTarget) ~= nil and ( PQR_IsOnInterruptList(cName) ~= nil or PQR_IsInterruptAll() ~= nil ) and currentPercent > intPctDelay then _castSpell(102060) PQR_DelayRotation(.5) end
--ChargeInterrupt-- if chargeInterrupt == true and (cdRemains(6552) > 0 or rangeCheck(6552,castingTarget) == nil) and (cdRemains(102060) > 0 or CheckInteractDistance(castingTarget,3) == nil) and cdRemains(100) == 0 and rangeCheck(100,castingTarget) == true and poppedCDs("player") == nil and ( PQR_IsOnInterruptList(cName) ~= nil or PQR_IsInterruptAll() ~= nil ) and currentPercent > intPctDelay then _castSpell(100,castingTarget) PQR_DelayRotation(1) --Delay while charging end
--HT-- if gagOrder == true and (cdRemains(6552) > 0 or rangeCheck(6552,castingTarget) == nil) and (cdRemains(102060) > 0 or CheckInteractDistance(castingTarget,3) == nil) and (cdRemains(100) > 0 or rangeCheck(100,castingTarget) == nil or poppedCDs("player") == true or chargeInterrupt == false) and cdRemains(57755) == 0 and rangeCheck(57755,castingTarget) == true and ( PQR_IsOnInterruptList(cName) ~= nil or PQR_IsInterruptAll() ~= nil ) and currentPercent > intPctDelay then _castSpell(57755,castingTarget) end
--SB-- if (cdRemains(6552) > 0 or rangeCheck(6552,castingTarget) == nil) and (cdRemains(102060) > 0 or CheckInteractDistance(castingTarget,3) == nil) and (cdRemains(100) > 0 or rangeCheck(100,castingTarget) == nil or poppedCDs("player") == true) and (cdRemains(57755) > 0) and IsPlayerSpell(107570) == true and cdRemains(107570) == 0 and rangeCheck(107570,castingTarget) == true and ( PQR_IsOnInterruptList(cName) ~= nil or PQR_IsInterruptAll() ~= nil ) and currentPercent > intPctDelay then sb = true _castSpell(107570,castingTarget) end end

Ability.Name: Fury_2-3Rotation
Ability.Lua:
--DemoBaner-- if cdRemains(114203) == 0 and demoBannerKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(114203)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(114203) end
--HeroicLeap-- if cdRemains(6544) == 0 and heroicLeapKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(6544)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(6544) end
if inMelee() == true then
--autoRecklessness-- if autoReck == true and ( UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") and select(7,UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player")) - GetTime() >= 5) or cdRemains(86346) <= 4 or cdRemains(12292) <= 3 then _castSpell(1719) end
--BloodBath-- if autoBloodBath == true and UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") and select(7,UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player")) - GetTime() >= 5 and ( UnitBuffID("player",1719) or cdRemains(1719) > 60 or autoReck == false ) then _castSpell(12292) end
--BerserkRage-- if UnitBuffID("player",12880) == nil and UnitBuffID("player",131116) == nil then _castSpell(18499) end
--Dcalm-- if ( IsPlayerSpell(12292) == false and UnitPower("player") >= 40 ) or ( IsPlayerSpell(12292) == true and UnitBuffID("player",12292) ~= nil and UnitPower("player") >= 40 ) then _castSpell(85730) end
--HeroicStrike-- if ( getHp("target") >= 20 and ( UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") ~= nil and UnitPower("player") >= 40 ) or ( UnitBuffID("player",85730) ~= nil and UnitPower("player") >= 30 ) ) or UnitPower("player") >= 110 then _castSpell(845) end --EndHeroicStrikes--
--BT-- if ( getHp("target") < 20 and UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") ~= nil and UnitPower("player") >= 30 ) == false then _castSpell(23881) end
--WS-- if UnitBuffID("player",46916) ~= nil and getHp("target") >= 20 and ( cdRemains(23881) > 0 and cdRemains(23881) <= 1 ) then _castSpell(100130) end end
--Wait-- if inCombat() == true and ( getHp("target") < 20 and UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") ~= nil and UnitPower("player") >= 30 ) == false and ( cdRemains(23881) > 0 and cdRemains(23881) <= 1 ) then return true end
if inMelee() == true then
--CS-- _castSpell(86346)
--DrHighPrio-- if useDR == true and UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") == nil and UnitBuffID("player",12292) ~= nil then _castSpell(118000) end
--Execute-- _castSpell(5308)
--RB-- if ( UnitBuffID("player",131116) ~= nil and select(4,UnitBuffID("player",131116)) == 2 ) or ( UnitBuffID("player",131116) ~= nil and ( getHp("target") <= 20 or UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") ~= nil or UnitBuffID("player",12292) ~= nil or UnitBuffID("player",1719) ~= nil or cdRemains(86346) >= 6 or ( cdRemains(23881) >= 1 and select(7,UnitBuffID("131116")) - GetTime() <= 6 ))) then _castSpell(85288) end
--WS-- if UnitBuffID("player",46916) ~= nil and getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(100130) end
--SW-- if shockWaveKey == 1 then _castSpell(46968) end
--DR-- if useDR == true then _castSpell(118000) end
--HT-- if gagOrder == false and inMelee() == true then _castSpell(57755) end
--BS-- if UnitPower("player") < 70 and UnitDebuffID("target",86346) == nil then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() ~= nil then if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(469)) == 0 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(469)) end end end
--WS-- if UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") ~= nil and getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(100130) end
--IV-- if getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(103840) end
--WS-- if cdRemains(86346) >= 1 and UnitPower("player") >= 80 and getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(100130) end
--BS-- if UnitPower("player") < 70 then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() ~= nil then if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(469)) == 0 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(469)) end end end end

Ability.Name: Fury_Aoe(4+)Rotation
Ability.Lua:
if cdRemains(114203) == 0 and demoBannerKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(114203)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(114203) end
if cdRemains(6544) == 0 and heroicLeapKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(6544)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(6544) end
if inMelee() == true then
--BloodBath-- if autoBloodBath == true then _castSpell(12292) end
if UnitBuffID("player",12880) == nil then _castSpell(18499) end
if shockWaveKey == 1 then _castSpell(46968) end
if useDR == true then _castSpell(118000) end
if gagOrder == false and inMelee() == true then _castSpell(57755) end
if getHp("target") >= 20 and UnitPower("player") <= 80 then _castSpell(23881) end
_castSpell(86346)
if UnitBuffID("player",85739) ~= nil and select(4, UnitBuffID("player",85739)) == 3 then _castSpell(85288) end
_castSpell(1680)
if UnitPower("player") < 70 then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() ~= nil then if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(469)) == 0 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(469)) end end end end

Ability.Name: Arms_BasicRotation
Ability.Lua:
--Vars local tfb, _, _, tfbCount, _, _, tfbExp = UnitBuffID("player", 56638) local cs,_,_,_,_,_,csExp = UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "player")
if cdRemains(114203) == 0 and demoBannerKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(114203)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(114203) end
if cdRemains(6544) == 0 and heroicLeapKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(6544)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(6544) end
if inMelee() == true then
if UnitBuffID("player",12880) == nil then _castSpell(18499) end
if getHp("player") <= 80 and IsUsableSpell(34428) ~= nil then _castSpell(34428) end
if UnitPower("player") >= 40 then _castSpell(85730) end
if getHp("target") >= 20 and UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "player") ~= nil then if tfb and ( tfbExp - GetTime() <= 2 ) or ( tfbCount == 5 and IsUsableSpell(7384) ~= nil ) or (( cs ~= nil and csExp - GetTime() <= 2 ) and cdRemains(86346) > 0) then _castSpell(78) elseif UnitBuffID("player",85730) ~= nil or UnitPower("player") > 110 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(78)) end end
_castSpell(12294)
if ( cs == nil or csExp - GetTime() <= 1.5 ) then _castSpell(86346) end
if getHp("target") < 20 then _castSpell(5308) end
if IsUsableSpell(7384) ~= nil then _castSpell(7384) end
if shockWaveKey == 1 then _castSpell(46968) end
if useDR == true then _castSpell(118000) end
if getHp("target") >= 20 and ( UnitPower("player") >= 70 or cs ~= nil ) then _castSpell(1464) end end
if inCombat() and gagOrder == false and inMelee() == true then _castSpell(57755) end
if inMelee() == true then if UnitPower("player") < 70 and cs == nil then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() ~= nil then _castSpell(469) end end
if getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(1464) end
if getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(103840) end
if UnitPower("player") < 70 then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() ~= nil then _castSpell(469) end end end

Ability.Name: Arms_AoeRotation
Ability.Lua:
--Vars local tfb, _, _, tfbCount, _, _, tfbExp = UnitBuffID("player", 56638) local cs,_,_,_,_,_,csExp = UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "player")
if cdRemains(114203) == 0 and demoBannerKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(114203)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(114203) end
if cdRemains(6544) == 0 and heroicLeapKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(6544)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(6544) end
if inMelee() == true then
if getHp("player") <= 80 and IsUsableSpell(34428) ~= nil then _castSpell(34428,"target") end
if UnitBuffID("player",12880) == nil then _castSpell(18499) end
if UnitPower("player") >= 40 then _castSpell(85730) end
if shockWaveKey == 1 then _castSpell(46968) end
if useDR == true then _castSpell(118000) end
if gagOrder == false and inMelee() then _castSpell(57755) end
if getHp("target") >= 20 and cs ~= nil then if tfb and ( tfbExp - GetTime() <= 2 ) or ( tfbCount == 5 and IsUsableSpell(7384) ~= nil ) or (( cs ~= nil and csExp - GetTime() <= 2 ) and cdRemains(86346) > 0) then _castSpell(78,"target") elseif UnitBuffID("player",85730) ~= nil or UnitPower("player") > 110 then if UnitBuffID("player",12328) ~= nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(78)) elseif UnitBuffID("player",12328) == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(845)) end end end end
if inCombat() == true and UnitPower("player") >= 60 then _castSpell(12328) end
if inMelee() == true then _castSpell(12294,"target")
if ( cs == nil or csExp - GetTime() <= 1.5 ) then _castSpell(86346) end
_castSpell(6343)
if IsUsableSpell(7384) ~= nil then _castSpell(7384,"target") end
_castSpell(1680)
if UnitPower("player") < 70 then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() ~= nil then _castSpell(469) end end end

Ability.Name: Fury_BasicRotation
Ability.Lua:
--DemoBaner-- if cdRemains(114203) == 0 and demoBannerKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(114203)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(114203) end
--HeroicLeap-- if cdRemains(6544) == 0 and heroicLeapKey ~= nil and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(6544)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(6544) end
if inMelee() == true then
--autoRecklessness-- if autoReck == true and ( UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") and select(7,UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player")) - GetTime() >= 5) or cdRemains(86346) <= 4 or cdRemains(12292) <= 3 then _castSpell(1719) end
--BloodBath-- if autoBloodBath == true and UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") and select(7,UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player")) - GetTime() >= 5 and ( UnitBuffID("player",1719) or cdRemains(1719) > 60 or autoReck == false ) then _castSpell(12292) end
--BerserkRage-- if UnitBuffID("player",12880) == nil and UnitBuffID("player",131116) == nil then _castSpell(18499) end
--Dcalm-- if ( IsPlayerSpell(12292) == false and UnitPower("player") >= 40 ) or ( IsPlayerSpell(12292) == true and UnitBuffID("player",12292) ~= nil and UnitPower("player") >= 40 ) then _castSpell(85730) end
--HeroicStrike-- if ( getHp("target") >= 20 and ( UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") ~= nil and UnitPower("player") >= 40 ) or ( UnitBuffID("player",85730) ~= nil and UnitPower("player") >= 30 ) ) or UnitPower("player") >= 110 then _castSpell(78) end --EndHeroicStrikes--
--BT-- if ( getHp("target") < 20 and UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") ~= nil and UnitPower("player") >= 30 ) == false then _castSpell(23881) end
--WS-- if UnitBuffID("player",46916) ~= nil and getHp("target") >= 20 and ( cdRemains(23881) > 0 and cdRemains(23881) <= 1 ) then _castSpell(100130) end end
--Wait-- if inCombat() == true and ( getHp("target") < 20 and UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") ~= nil and UnitPower("player") >= 30 ) == false and ( cdRemains(23881) > 0 and cdRemains(23881) <= 1 ) then return true end
if inMelee() == true then
--CS-- _castSpell(86346)
--DrHighPrio-- if useDR == true and UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") == nil and UnitBuffID("player",12292) ~= nil then _castSpell(118000) end
--Execute-- _castSpell(5308)
--RB-- if ( UnitBuffID("player",131116) ~= nil and select(4,UnitBuffID("player",131116)) == 2 ) or ( UnitBuffID("player",131116) ~= nil and ( getHp("target") <= 20 or UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") ~= nil or UnitBuffID("player",12292) ~= nil or UnitBuffID("player",1719) ~= nil or cdRemains(86346) >= 6 or ( cdRemains(23881) >= 1 and select(7,UnitBuffID("131116")) - GetTime() <= 6 ))) then _castSpell(85288) end
--WS-- if UnitBuffID("player",46916) ~= nil and getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(100130) end
--SW-- if shockWaveKey == 1 then _castSpell(46968) end
--DR-- if useDR == true then _castSpell(118000) end
--HT-- if gagOrder == false and inMelee() == true then _castSpell(57755) end
--BS-- if UnitPower("player") < 70 and UnitDebuffID("target",86346) == nil then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() ~= nil then if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(469)) == 0 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(469)) end end end
--WS-- if UnitDebuffID("target",86346,"player") ~= nil and getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(100130) end
--IV-- if getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(103840) end
--WS-- if cdRemains(86346) >= 1 and UnitPower("player") >= 80 and getHp("target") >= 20 then _castSpell(100130) end
--BS-- if UnitPower("player") < 70 then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() ~= nil then if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(469)) == 0 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(469)) end end end end

Ability.Name: Prot_BasicRotation
Ability.Lua:
--Defensives-- if inCombat() then if getHp("player") <= 35 then _castSpell(871) end
if getHp("player") <= 95 and UnitPower("player") >= 60 then _castSpell(112048) end
if getHp("player") <= 25 then _castSpell(97462) end
if getHp("player") <= 15 then _castSpell(12975) end end
if inMelee() then if getHp("player") <= 50 then _castSpell(1160) end
if getHp("player") <= 80 and IsUsableSpell(34428) then _castSpell(34428) end end
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(114203)) == 0 and demoBannerKey == 1 and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(114203)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(114203) end
--OffensiveRotation-- if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(6544)) == 0 and heroicLeapKey == 1 and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(6544)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(6544) end
if shockWaveKey == 1 then _castSpell(46968) end
if inMelee() then if UnitBuffID("player",12880) == nil then _castSpell(18499) end
if ( UnitBuffID("player",122510) or UnitPower("player") > 90 ) then _castSpell(78) end
if UnitPower("player") >= 40 then _castSpell(85730) end
if UnitDebuffID("target",115798) == nil then _castSpell(6343) end
_castSpell(23922)
_castSpell(6572)
if UnitPower("player") < 70 then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() == true then _castSpell(469) end end
_castSpell(20243)
end

Ability.Name: Prot_AoeRotation
Ability.Lua:
--Defensives-- if inCombat() then if getHp("player") <= 35 then _castSpell(871) end
if getHp("player") <= 95 and UnitPower("player") >= 60 then _castSpell(2565) end
if getHp("player") <= 25 then _castSpell(97462) end
if getHp("player") <= 15 then _castSpell(12975) end end
if inMelee() then if getHp("player") <= 50 then _castSpell(1160) end
if getHp("player") <= 80 and IsUsableSpell(34428) then _castSpell(34428) end end
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(114203)) == 0 and demoBannerKey == 1 and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(114203)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(114203) end
--OffensiveRotation-- if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(6544)) == 0 and heroicLeapKey == 1 and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(6544)) if SpellIsTargeting() ~= nil then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(6544) end
if shockWaveKey == 1 then _castSpell(46968) end
if inMelee() then if UnitBuffID("player",12880) == nil then _castSpell(18499) end
if ( UnitBuffID("player",122510) or UnitPower("player") > 90 ) then _castSpell(845) end
if UnitPower("player") >= 40 then _castSpell(85730) end
_castSpell(6343)
_castSpell(23922)
_castSpell(6572)
if UnitPower("player") < 70 then if hasApBuff() == nil then _castSpell(6673) elseif hasApBuff() == true then _castSpell(469) end end
_castSpell(20243)
end
